sentence: However the room maintenance at this hotel is what I would expect at a cheap run down motel
Rooms were very old and need to be refurbished

The in hotel restaurant Trace had lots of options and what I had was good though hotel restaurants are always priceyRom was not in good repair Outlet covers screwed on crooked multiple handles missing from drawers
Initial impression of hotel is tired and needs a significant restoration or remodel
Overall this place needs repairs a lot of them
Everything seem to be falling apart inside the rooms then when I confronted the front desk about it they said they were undergoing renovations and that ’s why the leather was ripped my headboard

Upon further inspection there were holes in the comforter hair on the throw pillow on the couch crumbs in the corner of the couch the bottom corner of the wall near bathroom entrance needs repaired the shelves for the mini bar items needed dusted the glass panel for the shower had something that dripped down the outside of the glass and was nt ever wiped off the water pressure at the sink is too strong and you get splashed everytime you turn on the sink the screws were half out if the vent in the ceiling of the shower the caulk grout in the showere especially one corner really needed cleaned there was a stain on the vanity mirror the toilet paper holder is very wobbly you have to hold it in place to rip off a piece of toilet paper
We were n’t told before hand that the hotel was under renovation
We were n’t told the place is undergoing a MAJOR renovation until our time to cancel the reservation had passed
First off all the room did not look anything like the view online and if I was told before I booked that it was under renovations I would never made the reservation
They just recently renovated the building rooms and the suite was very stylish
The renovation to the hotel is lovely the guest rooms are far brighter and feel more open and spacious
I have stayed at the W Midtown pre and post renovation something like 20 times in the past year for business and it never disappoints
The rooms are refreshed and updated
They renovated the lobby and I enjoy the food and drink service
The hotel has had a complete reno and is back to being a very swanky place to stay in Atlanta
The new renovations are amazing
Love the newly remodeled hotel and the Living Room food and service was amazing
Great atmosphere as well the renovations were top notch and definitely recomed this place for your next stay in Atlanta
Stayed in spectacular king and the room was good sized clean and felt updated
